00266     struct MyRayResultCallback : public btCollisionWorld::RayResultCallback
00267     {
00268         virtual btScalar addSingleResult( btCollisionWorld::LocalRayResult& rayResult, bool bNormalInWorldSpace)
00269         {
00270             results.push_back( std::make_pair(rayResult.m_hitFraction, rayResult.m_collisionObject) );
00271             return rayResult.m_hitFraction;
00272         }
00273 
00274         static bool cmp( const std::pair<float, std::string>& i, const std::pair<float, std::string>& j )
00275         {
00276             if( i.first > j.first ) return false;
00277             if( j.first > i.first ) return true;
00278             return false;
00279         }
00280 
00281         std::vector < std::pair<float, const btCollisionObject*> > results;
00282     };
